description:
The gameplay is a bit glitchy. A lot of models don't render, and most of the bots are frozen until you kill them once or twice. 

The features are neat when they're working, but I wouldn't recommend it as a competitive game.
The real version of this is cube2 sauerbraten which can be downloaded for free online. The real version is epic. That gets a 5-start.
summary: Cut it a break. It's the demo version

description: es un juego expetacular y va con shaders pero va como a 60 fps y esta bueno y entretenido se los recomiendo
summary: es muy buen shooter y buen rendimiento

description: esta muy bueno el juego lo recomiendo
